job.title: Technical Marketing Engineer - Data Center, Network Architect
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: If you are a Technical Marketing Engineer with experience with networking technologies, please read on!  Recognized as one of Americas' fastest-growing companies in 2021, we help clients simplify their technical operations by introducing network automation and distributing data. We allow our clients to gain more visibility across their entire network which enables them to cut costs and leverage open networking hardware.  We are looking for a talented Network Engineer who is strong at solving complex challenges. This person should have an expert-level understanding of Data Center networking. Experience with virtualization platforms would be a great skill.  What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position  At least 10+ years of experience and knowledge of: So, if you are a Technical Marketing Engineer with experience in Data Center networking, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Ian.Henderson@Optello.com Ian Henderson - Recruiter - Optello  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
